inclusion.criterion: HER-2 immuno-histochemical (IHC) (3 +) stain or her-2 silver in situ hybridization(SISH)/fluorescence in situ hybridization(FISH) (+)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Herzuma® -capecitabine/cisplatin combination regimen is planned as a first line treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other type of cancer of Gastric or gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma (e.g., lymphoma, sarcoma)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: HER-2 (0/1+) in IHC or her-2 SISH/FISH (-)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who previously performed stomach cancer treatment as a palliative setting
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy.
